snippet.title: Demo Trailer Penumbra Tower - Indie Roguelike
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Today & Give the Demo a Try 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2600290/Penumbra_Tower/

Penumbra Tower is a grid-movement roguelike. Each floor of the tower is randomized and contains dangerous enemies that stand in your way. Find useful items that can help you ascend the tower. How far can you climb?

#gamedev #devlog #roguelike
